titleInfo.title: Unidentified Drouillard child in a sailor suit, between 1885 and 1904

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: A cabinet card portrait photograph of an unidentified Drouillard child (male) pictured in a sailor suit, between 1885 and 1904. While it is unknown which Drouillard this is, the young man is probably a direct descendant of the Civil War veteran Captain James Pierre Drouillard (1839-1892) and Mary Florence Kirkman Drouillard (1843-1905). The Drouillard family resided in Dickson County, Tennessee for many years and subsequently in Nashville, Tennessee. A logo on the verso: "Poole Art Company, Corner Cherry & Union Sts., Nashville, Tenn." And: "negative no. 39128." Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 cabinet card photograph : sepia ; 4.25 x 6 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact the Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5782.
